my work

  • martinovy kavárny — a site where i rate coffee places. also available as an android app.

  • hraje zase dneska sparta? — it tells you when Sparta (a beloved football team here in Prague) plays their games (so you can avoid the people on the street)

  • event system — made for a school event during my graduation year of high school as a part of my leaving exam. written in elixir, able to serve hundreds of students trying to sign up in real-time.

  • and many more... — just look at my github profile
